attributes.action: stop leading tributes to pointless celebrities and to spend more time running the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since when was it part of the Prime Minister's job to lead the country in public displays of grief for every talentless celebrity who dies? This is just adding to the relentless dumbing down of our culture and condoning a tabloid view of the country that should have no place in the business of government.

Leave the celebrities to the red-tops and their readership. The job of government is to govern.
